parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I’m thankful that we are here at a meeting

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: with all the friends that support us by adding their grain of sand.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: We suffer because we are poor,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: orphaned from the deaths of our father and mother.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My husband also had an accident because of the government.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: So I was left alone with my children

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and there’s no one to support me,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Two of my children grew up and left,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: incapacitated because of that operation to sterilise me.
